name: Irfan Khan
bio: Irfan is an experienced tour guide with a deep knowledge of the rich history and culture of Bangladesh. He specializes in cultural tours to heritage sites and local villages.

name: Bristy Akter
bio: Bristy offers eco-friendly tours to explore the natural beauty of Bangladesh, from the Sundarbans to the hill tracts of Chittagong. She is passionate about wildlife conservation and sustainable travel.

name: Rabby Hasan
bio: Rabby is an expert trekking guide with years of experience taking tourists through the lush trails of Bangladesh's forests and mountains, including the famous Nafakhum Waterfall trek.

name: Surela Akter
bio: Surela is a passionate guide who specializes in historical sites. She provides fascinating insights into the ancient architecture and history of Bangladesh's major landmarks.

name: Jahid Hasan
bio: Jahid is a certified adventure sports guide, skilled in guiding travelers through exciting activities like kayaking, rock climbing, and paragliding in the scenic locations of Bangladesh.

name: Nabila Jahan
bio: Nabila offers unique experiences, immersing travelers in local culture through cooking classes, visits to local markets, and visits to traditional family homes for authentic Bengali meals.

name: Jahid Hasan
bio: Jahid is an expert in guiding tourists through Bangladesh's historical monuments and museums, offering deep insights into the nation's heritage, art, and architecture.

name: Dua Rahman
bio: Dua specializes in luxury travel, offering personalized services to affluent tourists who wish to explore Bangladesh in comfort and style, including high-end hotels and exclusive experiences.
